CustomField.description: Factor for calculating serving quantity. Examples: If one item serves 4 people, then ServiceFactor = 4. If each person requires 2 items, ServiceFactor = .5.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Factor for calculating serving quantity. Examples: If one item serves 4 people, then ServiceFactor = 4. If each person requires 2 items, ServiceFactor = .5.
CustomField.label: Service Factor
